org.un.bungeni.translators.xslttransformer
Interface XSLTTransformerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
XSLTTransformer
public interface XSLTTransformerInterface

This is the interface for the java XSLT transformer object. It is used to perform an XSLT transformation on a Document

Method Summary
 javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource transform(javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource aDocumentSource, javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource anXSLTSource)
          This method applies the given XSLT to the given Document and returns the Document obtained after the transformation
 javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource transformWithParam(javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource aDocumentSource, javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource anXSLTSource, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> aParamSet)
          This method applies the given XSLT with the given parameters to the given Document and returns the Document obtained after the transformation
 

Method Detail

transform

javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource transform(javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource aDocumentSource,
                                                  javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource anXSLTSource)
                                                  throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                                         java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
This method applies the given XSLT to the given Document and returns the Document obtained after the transformation

Parameters:
aDocumentSource - the stream source of the document to transform
anXSLTSource - the stream source of the XSLT to apply to the document that you want to transform
Returns:
the new Document resulting applying the given XSLT to the given Docuement
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

transformWithParam

javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource transformWithParam(javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource aDocumentSource,
                                                           javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource anXSLTSource,
                                                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> aParamSet)
                                                           throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
This method applies the given XSLT with the given parameters to the given Document and returns the Document obtained after the transformation

Parameters:
aDocumentSource - the stream source of the document to transform
anXSLTSource - the stream source of the XSLT to apply to the document that you want to transform
aParamSet - an Hash Map containing a set of pair (name, object) that are the parameters of the XSLT transformation
Returns:
the new Document resulting applying the given XSLT to the given Docuement
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
